Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on his friendship with a thief called Musashino, our main character Zenbei (Hirao Mimi) creates his poignant piece of art through Chicago’s performance theater, Deep Schames Theater. As such there are juxtapositions between visual mediums used for storytelling that has never been seen before.
